Text: O̩do̩ ogu nyoke mebie ki Je̩ro̩boam jʼonu Israe̩l, Azaraya, o̩ma Amazaya onu Juda, chane̩ ejʼonu-wñ.
O̩do̩-wñ chʼe̩gwe̩fa e̩gba ki chane̩ ejʼonu; i la jʼonu o̩do̩ ooje nyoke meji Je̩rusale̩m; odu iye-wñ la ko̩ Je̩kolaya e-Je̩rusale̩m.
Owñ la fʼe̩wñ ki nyo̩ eju Jihofa che alu du kʼata-wñ Amazaya che.
Ma muda gbʼotete otete le̩ rinyo̩ n; amone̩ le̩ tetache iche̩bo̩ kpai otulale egujo oj otete otete.
Taku Jihofa fʼonu le̩ gwʼo̩ga, oñ i mud e̩no̩ga ikpemute gbogbo mʼo̩jo̩ uku-wñ. I la gugu ef unyi kʼi chʼe̩date̩ ojoji. Jotam o̩ma onu le̩ la nʼo̩da abo unyi-wñ, owñ nʼajo̩ amone̩ ane̩ le̩ aka.
Oñ o̩la Azaraya kibo̩ kpai e̩wñ du kʼi che, inabali-wñ che̩ko̩ rʼef o̩takada Iko E̩wñ Amonu Juda le̩ n?
Oñ Azaraya cholu manyʼamata-wñ; taku ma mʼowñ du ji manyʼamata-wñ ef ewo Defid; taku Jotam o̩ma-wñ jʼonu koji-wñ.
O̩do̩ ogue̩gwa nyoke me̩jo̩ kʼAzaraya jʼonu Juda Ze̩karaya o̩ma Je̩ro̩boam jʼonu Israe̩l Samaria ochu me̩fa.
I la fʼe̩wñ ki bie̩ne̩ eju Jihofa che, alu kʼamata-wñ che; i kwo bʼadure Je̩ro̩boam o̩ma Nebat eche te̩ n, owñ chʼe-kʼi ne̩ je̩ ñw abo Israe̩l dure le̩.
Taku Shalum o̩ma Jebe̩sh fʼalu da nyʼu, oñ i fʼu gwo eju amone̩, tak i mʼu du kpa, oñ i jʼonu koji-wñ.
O̩la Ze̩karaya kibo̩, go, inabali-wñ che̩ko̩ rʼef o̩takada Iko E̩wñ Amonu Israe̩l.
Owñ chʼo̩la Jihofa, e-kʼi ka ñwu Jihiu kakini, Amo̩ma-we̩ agugu oj ede Israe̩l kad o̩gba e̩ke̩le̩-we̩. Abe̩le̩ i wa che̩.
Shalum o̩ma Jebe̩sh chane̩ ejʼonu o̩do̩ ogue̩gwa nyoke me̩la kʼUzaya jʼonu Juda; oñ i jʼonu ochuʼka Samaria.
Taku Me̩nahe̩m, o̩ma Gedai, mute̩gu kwo Tirza alo, oñ i lewa Samaria, akpa Shalum o̩ma Jebe̩sh Samaria, oñ i mʼu du kpa. Tak i jʼonu koji-wñ.
Oñ O̩la Shalum kibo̩, kpai alo kʼi da le̩, go, inabali-wñ che̩ko̩ rʼef o̩takada Iko E̩wñ Amonu Israe̩l.

Taku Me̩nahe̩m fu Tifsa kpo̩fo̩, kpʼabo du ku ma jʼefu uwñ, kpai alo̩me̩-wñ, akwo Tirza le̩. Todabu ku ma ma bi o̩na ñw u n, todule̩ i fʼu kpo̩fo̩. I la mʼabobule̩ du ku ma defu ku ma jʼo̩mo̩ efu kpana.
O̩do̩ ogue̩gwa nyoke me̩la kʼAzaraya jʼonu Juda, Me̩nahe̩m o̩ma Gedai chane̩ ejʼonu Israe̩l. I la je̩ o̩do̩ me̩gwa Samaria.
I laño̩ fʼe̩wñ ki bie̩ne̩ eju Jihofa che; i kwo bʼadure Je̩roboam, o̩ma Nebat, eche te̩ o̩jo̩ du kʼi deju kade n, owñ chʼe-kʼi ne̩ je̩ ñw abo Israe̩l dure le̩.
Taku Pul, onu Asiria, lewa kobʼane̩ le̩; taku Me̩nahe̩m mʼajifa tale̩nt icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ko ñwu Pul, todu kʼi mud e̩ne̩ ubi-wñ kʼo̩fe̩ le̩ ki lonyane̩ ef o̩wo̩-wñ.

Me̩nahe̩m le nafʼo̩ko̩ le̩ bu ñw amanana ef abo Israe̩l kʼama ki ra, e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-ma ne̩ she̩ke̩l ajifa ooje, kʼi ko ñw onu Asiria le̩. Abe̩le̩ tak onu Asiria mudabi oñ i ma kpo̩kpe̩ oj ane̩ o̩mo̩ n.
Oñ o̩la Me̩nahe̩m ki bo̩, kpʼe̩wñ du kʼi che, inabali-wñ che̩ko̩ rʼef o̩takada Iko E̩wñ Amonu Israe̩l le̩ n?
Taku Me̩nahe̩m cholu manyʼamata-wñ; oñ Pe̩kahaya, o̩ma-wñ, jʼanu koji-wñ.
O̩do̩ ooje kʼAzaraya jʼonu Juda, Pe̩kahaya o̩ma Me̩nahe̩m chane̩ ejʼonu Israe̩l Samaria. I la je̩ o̩do̩ meji.
I ño̩ fʼe̩wñ ki bie̩ne̩ eju Jihofa che; i kwo bʼadure Je̩ro̩boam o̩ma Nebat eche te̩ n, owñ chʼe-ki ne̩ je̩ ñw abo Israe̩l dure le̩.

Taku Peka o̩ma Re̩malaya, agboji ogu-wñ, fʼalu da nyʼu, oñ i mʼu du kpa Samaria, ef unyi onu onugo onugo, manyʼArgob kpai Arie; aboke̩le̩ Gilead ooje ño̩ jʼugbo-wñ o̩mo̩; i mʼu du kpa, tak i jʼonu koji-wñ.
Oñ o̩la Pe̩kahaya ki bo̩ kpai e̩wñ du kʼi che, go, inabali-wñ che̩ko̩ rʼef o̩takada Iko E̩wñ Amonu Israe̩l le̩.
O̩do̩ ooje nyoke meji kʼAzaraya jʼonu Juda Peka o̩ma Re̩malaya chane̩ ejʼonu Israe̩l Samaria. I la je̩ o̩do̩ ogu.
I laño̩ fʼe̩wñ ki bie̩ne̩ eju Jihofa che; i kwo bʼadure Je̩ro̩boam o̩ma Nebat eche te̩ n, owñ chʼe-kʼi ne̩ je̩ ñw abo Israe̩l dure le̩.

O̩kpanachi Peka onu Israe̩l le̩, Tiglat-pilesa onu Asiria lewa fʼAijo̩n du kpai Ebe̩l-be̩t-maaka kpai Janoa kpai Kede̩sh kpai Hazo̩r kpai Gilead kpai Galili kpai ane̩ Naftali chaka; oñ i fʼabo le̩ mu nyʼAsiria.
Taku Hoshia, o̩ma Ela, fʼalo da nyu Peka o̩ma Re̩malaya, oñ i mʼu du kpa tʼane̩, tak i jʼonu koji-wñ o̩do̩ Jotam o̩ma Uzaya e̩kogu.
Oñ o̩la Peka kibo̩, kpai e̩wñ du kʼi che, go, inabali-wñ che̩ko̩ rʼef o̩takada Iko E̩wñ Amonu Israe̩l le̩.
O̩do̩ ekeji ki Peka o̩ma Re̩malaya jʼonu Israe̩l Jotam, o̩ma Uzaya, chane̩ ejʼonu Juda.
O̩do̩-wñ chʼogue̩lu e̩gba ki chane̩ ejʼonu-wñ; i la je̩ o̩do̩ me̩gwe̩fa Je̩rusale̩m. Odu iye-wñ la ko̩ Jerusha o̩ma Zedo̩k.
Owñ la fʼe̩wñ ki nyo̩ eju Jihofa che; i che teju alu du kʼata-wñ Uzaya che le̩.
Ma muda gbʼotete otete le̩ rinyo̩ n; amone̩ tetache̩ iche̩bo̩ kpai otulale e̩gujo oj otete otete le̩. Owñ fʼalaku unyi Jihofa o̩wo̩ ate̩ ne̩.
Oñ o̩la Jotam ki bo̩, kpai e̩wñ du kʼi che, inabali-wñ che̩ko̩ rʼef o̩takada Iko E̩wñ Amonu Juda n?
Iko le̩ Jihofa chane̩ ekpe̩ Re̩zin onu Siria, kpai Peka, o̩ma Remalaya, nyʼakobo̩ Juda.
Oñ Jotam cholu manyʼamata-wñ, taku ma mʼu du ji manyʼamata-wñ ef ewo Defid ata-wñ le̩. Oñ Ehaz o̩ma-wñ jʼonu koji-wñ.
